#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int i,j,t,n,temp,count,flag,k,temp1,temp2;
	char a[20][20];
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		flag=0;
		cin>>n>>k;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<n;j++)
			cin>>a[i][j];
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<n;j++)
			{
				if(a[i][j]=='.')
				{
					temp=i;
					count=1;	
					while(temp>0)
					{
						temp--;
						if(a[temp][j]=='X')
						count++;
						else
						break;
					}
					temp=i;
					while(temp<(n-1))
					{
						temp++;
						if(a[temp][j]=='X')
						count++;
						else
						break;
					}
					if(count>=k)
					{
						flag=1;
						cout<<"YES"<<endl;
						break;
					} 
					temp=j;
					count=1;
					while(temp>0)
					{
						temp--;
						if(a[i][temp]=='X')
						count++;
						else
						break;
					}
					temp=j;
					while(temp<(n-1))
					{
						temp++;
						if(a[i][temp]=='X')
						count++;
						else
						break;
					}
					if(count>=k)
					{
						flag=1;
						cout<<"YES"<<endl;
						break;
					}
					temp1=i;
					temp2=j;
					count=1;
					while(temp1>0 && temp2>0)
					{
						temp1--;
						temp2--;
						if(a[temp1][temp2]=='X')
						count++;
						else
						break;
					}
					temp1=i;
					temp2=j;
					while((temp1<(n-1)) && (temp2<(n-1)))
					{
						temp1++;
						temp2++;
						if(a[temp1][temp2]=='X')
						count++;
						else
						break;
					}
					if(count>=k)
					{
						flag=1;
						cout<<"YES"<<endl;
						break;
					} 
					temp1=i;
					temp2=j;
					count=1;
					while((temp1<(n-1) ) && (temp2>0) )
					{
						temp1++;
						temp2--;
						if(a[temp1][temp2]=='X')
						count++;
						else
						break;
					}
					temp1=i;
					temp2=j;
					while((temp1>0)  && (temp2<(n-1)) )
					{
						temp1--;
						temp2++;
						if(a[temp1][temp2]=='X')
						count++;
						else
						break;
					}
					if(count>=k)
					{
						flag=1;
						cout<<"YES"<<endl;
						break;
					}
				}
			}
			if(flag==1)
			break;
		}
		if(flag==0)
		cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
